content:
Diagnosis
	1. Hepatocellular carcinoma, BCLC Stage A
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	Not indicated

	Radiotherapy
	Not indicated

	Chemotherapy
	Not indicated

	Clinical studies
	Enrolled in EMERALD-2 trial of durvalumab + bevacizumab vs sorafenib in early HCC
	Randomised to experimental arm 15 Feb 2024

	Current disease status
	Stable disease

	Current issues
	Mild fatigue

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today for cycle 3 assessment on EMERALD-2 trial. Tolerating treatment well with only grade 1 fatigue. No concerning symptoms. Latest AFP stable at 180 (baseline 200). Trial-mandated CT at 8 weeks shows stable disease by RECIST 1.1 criteria with 5.2cm segment 7 lesion unchanged. Liver function remains well-preserved with Child-Pugh A5 status. Performance status remains 0.

	Further investigations
	Trial-mandated blood tests and QoL questionnaires completed today

	Medication prescribed
	Continue trial medication as per protocol

	Follow up
	Next trial visit in 2 weeks for cycle 4
	CT assessment at 16 weeks as per protocol

	Required GP actions
	None required

cancer_timeline.value: Enrolled in EMERALD-2 trial and randomised to durvalumab + bevacizumab arm
CT shows stable 5.2cm segment 7 lesion by RECIST 1.1 criteria

status_updates.value: Early stage HCC on experimental arm of EMERALD-2 trial. Stable disease on 8 week assessment with good tolerability
Continuing trial medication as per protocol
CT assessment at 16 weeks as per protocol
Next trial visit in 2 weeks for cycle 4
